post.body: Afraid someone else already has twitter.com/jonathanross ;)
OMFG Suikoden. I guess there really is a PS3 exclusive I want now.
Just out of bed at 3pm and working at 5. Lol. Thank god I wasn't on the early!
Just stayed talkin with a mate over her 4 hour shift at work.. was a gd laugh and went past fast.. but she was getting Â£6 an hour for it!!
My followers are going down..!! I must endeavour to make my updates less dull.. unfortunately, this is my life!
Also, christmas tv has been crap. Royle Family last night has been the only great thing thus far. Well, Wallace & Gromit was good too
Been asked out tonight again.. hmm, we'll see. Tbh I think this xmas has been mainly boring. Hope.. something.. happens at new year
This christmas has been weird. I've probably been sleeping too much.
Slowly getting over my hangover. Had lamb and turkey at xmas dinner! Lamb is nice. Now gonna chill in bed with my old friend TV
The boys of the NYPD choir were singing Galway Bay, and the bells were ringing out for Christmas day!
Serious Christmas hangover is bad. Sure xmas dinner is gonna be fun :S
Been a funny xmas eve.Gonna go out for a few drinks anyway and hopefully a laugh. Maybe hit a club, though that doesnt seem very christmassy
"You Could Be Happy" by Snow Patrol is a genuinely beautiful song. And Eyes Open remains a great album.
Having to pay extra for Fable II pub games is a con. But I'll probably end up paying it. Maybe.
Think I've cracked how to solve my network problem. And with that, I'm going back to Fable II. Until Rab C Nesbitt comes on.
Xbox Live is doing my tits in. Seems great, when it works. Set up a network bridge but after reset doesn't work anymore. Maybe try a hub?
Managed to really cut my neck bad when I was shaving this morning.. Half asleep. No idea how. It's nipping like fuck.
Played Fallout 3 for a few hours. Impressed, thus far. Gonna go shower and then play some Fable II. Yeah, having an xbox day.
Got a beer hat in the secret santa. I know what I'm wearing during Christmas dinner.
"She was tracing her years with her fingers on her skin, saying well why don't I begin again?" http://twurl.nl/ogaoaq
